titleStmt.title: Contemplations vpon the principal passages of the holie historie. The third volume: in three bookes. By I. Hall, Doctor of Diuinitie
Contemplations upon the principall passages of the Holy Storie. Vol. 3
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H[umphrey] L[ownes and Eliot's Court Press] for Nathanael Butter, and William Butler,

notesStmt.note: Identification of printers from STC; "Eliot's Court Press pr[inted]. Aa-Gg"--STC.
The first volume was issued under the title: Contemplations upon the principall passages of the holy storie.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
